resources.string:
Game modes: 

1. Classic
Each player can shot one square at time. Turn changes unless the player hit a ship. The player with ship still afloat. 

2. Supershots
Same game mode as Classic, with the difference that ships sink with a single shot.
Back key pressed. Are you sure you don´t want to save the settings?
The ship is not correctly placed. \n\n The squares must be consecutive and oriented in only one direction.
Place the ship before continue with another one.
You didn\'t place all the ships on the board.
To place your ships touch the images and then select the squares where you want to place the ship. \n\n Select as many squares as indicated when touching the ship.
Are you sure you want to leave the game?
You are trying to reset the game.
Adjacent ships are not allowed. Place them separated between each other.
Ship already placed. Select another one.
Click \'Start Game\' and start the battle!!
Are you sure you want to leave the current game?
Project developed for Programming of Intelligent Systems subject - Telecommunications Engineering degree - University of Vigo 2016/17.\n We use Google GSON library under Apache-2.0 license.

You play first! 
The traffic light will be green when it is your turn and red when it is the opponent's turn. 
You can see the opponent's boats that you have sunk in the images with a red cross in the upper left corner. 

Make the first shot and start the game!
